FuncDef: This command configures a Provider Backbone Bridging (PBB) tunnel with Backbone VPLS (B-VPLS) service information.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the B-VPLS service for the PBB tunnel associated with this service. Values-service-id: 1 to 2147483648.
Specifies the backbone destination MAC-address for PBB packets.

Specifies a 24 bit service instance identifier for the PBB tunnel associated with this service. As part of the PBB frames, it is used at the destination PE as a demultiplexor field. Values-0 to 16777215.
